channel.title: 317 Pking help!
channel.description:
Ok hi guys,
If I Pk someone the items stay on the ground for like 10seconds then they disappear. How can I change it to like 90seconds?

item.title: 317 Pking help!
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

Itâ€™s located in itemhandler.java
What your looking for is this area:

[code]public class ItemHandler {

// PobDol: Setting VARS
public static int showItemTimer = 90;
public static int hideItemTimer = 90;

// Phate: Global Item VARS
public static int[] globalItemController = new int[5001];
public static int[] globalItemID = new int[5001];
public static int[] globalItemX = new int[5001];
public static int[] globalItemY = new int[5001];
public static int[] globalItemAmount = new int[5001];
public static boolean[] globalItemStatic = new boolean[5001];[/code]

And in order to change the delay you should be looking at something similar to this:

public static int showItemTimer = 10; public static int hideItemTimer = 10;

Just change that Part of text to this, or whatever the delay you wish

public static int showItemTimer = 90; public static int hideItemTimer = 90;

If you have anymore problems or questions please message me or a moderator.

Read full topic
